title: Match-3 Blueprint
description: Create exciting Match-3 Games! Quick and efficient, you will be building levels within minutes!
longDescription:
Video: <a href="https://youtu.be/O_eq7egjH8A">https://youtu.be/O_eq7egjH8A</>

The Match3FrameWork is designed to help you create market quality Match-3 game type. The tool is flexible and allows for easy integration of other systems. Creating Match-3 levels has never been so easy!

Designed to meet market quality by developers, the tool allows for a wide range of adjustable variables to edit your level. 

Quickly add your art assets by easily dragging and dropping them within the Blueprintâ€™s exposed variables. 

With this tool, you will create highly functional Match-3 levels within minutes!

Join the Facebook Page:  <a href="https://www.facebook.com/pages/Match3FrameWork/861393597237199">https://www.facebook.com/pages/Match3FrameWork/861393597237199</>

And check out the Unreal Engine 4 - Forum: <a href="https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?60913-Match-3-framework&highlight=match-3">https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?60913-Match-3-framework&highlight=match-3</>  to keep track of coming changes and the possibility for tutorial requests. Support is at the top of our priorities!
technicalDetails:
- Customizable Grid.
 - Customizable Game Piece.
 - Manual or random Game Piece placement.
 - 2D or 3D Game Pieces.
 - Easily reposition everything in the viewport.
 - Supports multiple platforms and viewport sizes.
 - Adjustable game rules like Game Piece count.
 - Adjust the game pace by setting the score increments to victory.
 - Featured: Special Double Match and Shuffle mechanics.

The game algorithm determines every possible move before the game pieces have even fallen down, which allows a quick responsive gameplay.

Bonus:
 - Score tracker and level transition.

Getting Started:
 - Quickly get started with <a href="https://drive.google.com/a/epicgames.com/file/d/0B-PR4tHMaxDSV2lLRXQtTjZJNjQ/view">these Sample art assets</>. NOTE - Place within Match3FrameWork folder

Demos:
 - <a href="https://drive.google.com/a/epicgames.com/folderview?id=0B-PR4tHMaxDSfjk5VXh4RmUyTkIwTjViSXI3T1pqMTF3emVOUEtmTGdWelhneXBIUUN6OEU&usp=sharing#">Demo for Windows</>
 - <a href="http://mortusnyte.itch.io/m3-bp-framework">Demo for HTML5</>

Supported Platforms:
Designed for Mobile and PC Platform - Windows, HTML5, Android, IOS
